amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the Federal Bureau of Prisons from requiring individuals in halfway houses or on home confinement to pay a subsistence fee.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 117 printed in House Report 115-297 to prohibit the Federal Bureau of Prisons from requiring individuals in halfway houses or on home confinement to pay a subsistence fee.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A113) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 225 (Roll no. 496).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A113) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 225 (Roll no. 496).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A113) offered by Ms. Norton.
